Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<java.lang.Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, Gui
public abstract class View
extends Observable<java.lang.Object>
This abstract class defines general methods which are used both in Cli and Gui related to the experience of users in game. Both Cli and Gui extends this abstract class in which general useful methods are defined.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Client client
    Reference to the component which is responsible to establish and keep a connection to the server.
    protected Controller controller
    Reference to the client-side Controller, which is the component that keeps a little part of the game logic in order to avoid to send useless commands to the server ("fat" client implementation).
    protected GamePhase currentGamePhase  
    protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PrintableColor> playersColors
    Association between players nicknames and their PrintableColor.
    protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> playersGods
    Association between players nicknames and their gods.
    protected int playersNumber  
    protected UpdateHandler updateHandler
    Reference to Visitor, which handles all possible updates received from server, and updates the view accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • playOnTurnSound

      public static void playOnTurnSound()
      This method allows players to hear a sound at the beginning of their turn.

    • listToStringBuilder

      public static java.lang.StringBuilder listToStringBuilder​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> value)
      This static method is used to generate an only String by giving as parameter several, different Strings in a list
      Parameters:
      value - is a list that contains the strings to join according to the logic of the method
      Returns:
      an only String, created by joining all the strings in value list given as parameter

    • getGodsNamesList

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGodsNamesList()
      This method is a simple getter of the Gods' names
      Returns:
      a List containing Gods names.

    • getClient

      public Client getClient()
      This is the getter of the Client
      Returns:
      the Client associated to a particular instance of Cli

    • getController

      public Controller getController()
      This method is a simple getter of the Controller client-side
      Returns:
      the instance of the Controller associated to Cli.

    • setCurrentGamePhase

      public void setCurrentGamePhase​(GamePhase currentGamePhase)
      This method is a simple getter of the current game phase. When the game phase changed this method, set the currentGamePhase attribute of the class to the new current game phase of the match
      Parameters:
      currentGamePhase - contains a reference to the new current game phase of the match

    • getPlayersGods

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPlayersGods()
      This method gives the possibility to know the association between nicknames and their God
      Returns:
      a Map containing an association between nickname of players involved in match and relative God.

    • setPlayersGods

      public void setPlayersGods​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> playersGods)
      This method makes a correspondence to the client and the God associated.
      Parameters:
      playersGods - is the corresponding God to the client.

    • getPlayersColors

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PrintableColor> getPlayersColors()
      This method is a getter which gives a correspondence to the color chosen from a single player.
      Returns:
      an association between a String which contains the nickname of a player involved and a PrintableColor that indicates a color a player can choose during INITIAL_INFO game phase.

    • setPlayersColors

      public void setPlayersColors​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PrintableColor> playersColors)
      This method makes a correspondence to the client and the color associated.
      Parameters:
      playersColors - is the corresponding color to the client.

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      This getter method gives information about the number of player involved in a match
      Returns:
      the number of player involved in the match

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber​(int playersNumber)
      This method is a simple setter that set the number of the player involved in a match
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - is an integer number that indicates how many player are involved in the match the particular Cli instance is involved in.

    • start

      public abstract void start()
      This abstract method is declared in order to manages the start of the match for classes that extends View.

    • setSelectableGods

      public abstract void setSelectableGods​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectableGods)
      This is an abstract setter method. It is used to set in classes which extends View a List of all the possible Gods a user related to the View can select
      Parameters:
      selectableGods - contains a list of all selectable Gods.

    • setSelectedNicknames

      public abstract void setSelectedNicknames​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedNicknames)
      This is an abstract setter method. At the moment of registration to the match, player are asked to set a nickname for the match. This method set a list which contains all the already chosen nickname in order to have different nicknames in the same game
      Parameters:
      selectedNicknames - contains all the already chosen nicknames

    • setSelectableColors

      public abstract void setSelectableColors​(java.util.List<PrintableColor> selectableColors)
      This is an abstract setter method. It is used to set in classes which extends View a List of all the possible colors a user related to the View can select
      Parameters:
      selectableColors - contains a list of all selectable colors.

    • getCurrentPhase

      public GamePhase getCurrentPhase()
      This method gives information about the current phase of the match
      Returns:
      the current phase of the match

    • forwardNotify

      public void forwardNotify​(Update update)
      This method forwards an update received to the client-side Controller
      Parameters:
      update - is the update received from Cli or Gui which is forwarded to the Controller client-side.
